column4: does anyone know, if it is possible to launch the program "ubuntu appearance" or similar (in german "Erscheinungsbild") in a console because I don't have access to the system-menu due to lacking panels?
or youre on a tty launching on remote display?
sorry dunno gnome well. id just do rm -fr ~/.g*; pkill gnome-panel;gnome-panel but youd lose all  you settings and be at default again..
